2fa.authenticator-prompt: Enter the code from your authenticator app
2fa.backup-code-prompt: Enter one of your backup codes
2fa.enter-valid-backup-code: Please enter a valid backup code
2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication

auth.2fa-enter-code: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.check-console-message: Since no email provider is configured, check your server console for the verification link.
auth.email-not-verified: Please verify your email address before signing in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
auth.email-verified-message: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
auth.enter-email-reset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.forgot-password-error: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
auth.invalid-invite-code: The invite code is invalid or has expired. You can still sign up and join later.
auth.login-error: An error occurred during sign in
auth.name: Name
auth.passkey-login-failed: Failed to sign in with passkey
auth.password-reset-success-message: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.pending-organization-approval: Your request to join {organization} is pending approval.
auth.please-wait: Please wait while we verify your email address.
auth.redirecting-to-signin: Redirecting to sign in page in 3 seconds...
auth.reset-password-error: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.reset-password-failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.reset-password-invalid-message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.reset-password-no-token: Invalid reset link. Please request a new one.
auth.reset-password-no-token-message: No reset token found. Please request a new password reset link.
auth.reset-password-sent-message: If an account exists with that email, we've sent a password reset link.
auth.social-login-error: An error occurred during social sign-in
auth.social-signup-error: An error occurred during social sign-up
auth.sso-login-error: An error occurred during SSO sign-in
auth.sso-not-configured: SSO is not configured for this domain
auth.verification-email-resent: Verification email has been resent! Please check your inbox.
auth.verification-email-sent: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.

profile.change-password-description: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.information-description: Update your personal information and profile picture
profile.name: Name
profile.picture-hint: JPG, PNG or WebP. Max 5MB. Recommended 400x400px

sessions.description: Manage your active sessions across different devices
sessions.security-tip: If you see a session you don't recognize, revoke it immediately and change your password.
sessions.title: Active Sessions
